Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check the remote air temperature sensor of MainPCB (indoor) for open or short conditions.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Communication error between indoor unit and wired remote controller
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Ensure communication between the wired remote controller and indoor unit is functioning.

Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check for communication issues between the Main PCB (Indoor) and the Main PCB (Outdoor cycle).
